pageTitle: "Be Good To Yourself, Be Kind To Others" Cuff Bracelet - Sheva Artisan Jewelry Boutique
textBeforeTable: We ship Jewelry between Monday and Friday using the U.S. Postal Service. Typically orders are shipped the same or next business day. Standard orders ship via USPS First Class or Priority Mail. Expedited orders ship via USPS Express Mail. Add your own review Style Code: TB-640 Be Good To Yourself, Be Kind To Others, Be Happy hand stamped on the outside and Encourage, Simplify, Laugh on the inside. A special inspirational sterling silver bracelet that distills the essence of life well lived. Designed by Sandy Comstock with hope that your every wish and dream come true! Handmade in the USA.
